title: Michael Page Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from Michael Page. Provide keyword and location to search for jobs. The actor handles pagination and can optionally fetch detailed job descriptions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Michael Page search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword and location.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Project Manager', 'Data Analyst'.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location filter for Michael Page jobs, e.g., 'New York', 'London'.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate job URLs from results (in-memory deduplication).
